context.text: List of cities proper by population - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Rank City Population Definition Area (km ) Population density (/km ) Country

This is a list of the most populous cities of the world defined according to the concept of city proper . The list ranks the world's urban municipal units (or well-defined statistical groupings of such units) according to population. Note that the populations listed are for the city proper and not for the urban area nor the metropolitan area. It should further be noted that the meaning and role of the political units taken for the purpose of this list to be the "city proper" are not and cannot be wholly consistent due to the differing systems of local government around the world. For a list of the most populous urban and metropolitan areas, see List of urban areas by population and List of metropolitan areas by population . Statistical definitions for each city and approximate surface area are also indicated.
List of cities proper by population
See historical urban community sizes for historical data.
List of cities proper by population
